titles.title: A bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service known as the Southpark Station in Alexandria, Louisiana, as the John "Marty" Thiels Southpark Station, in honor and memory of Thiels, a Louisiana postal worker who was killed in the line of duty on October 4, 2007.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Lieberman without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 506.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

action.text: Mr. Davis (IL) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 2272.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 400 - 0 (Roll no. 85).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 3/12/2008--Public Law. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service known as the Southpark Station in Alexandria, Louisiana, as the "John 'Marty' Thiels Southpark Station."
